Self.Wiki: This map object represents a patrol route for a character

PatrolType.Wiki: The type of patrol this represents.

WalkRegionNames.Wiki: A point that a patrol route will reach.

ArrivalAnimID.Wiki: The ID of animation to play when arriving at destination region.

ArrivalWaitTime.Wiki: Time in seconds to wait (after animation finishes) after arriving at destination region.

Option.Name: Return to First Point after Initial Route
Use Final Point Only, Idle, then Return to Start Point
Idle at Final Point, Look at Penultimate Point, then Return to Final Point
